title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) presented Letters conferring the title of Ambassador-in-Situ to 27 Senior Officers

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) presented Letters conferring the title of Ambassador-in-Situ to 27 Senior Officers at the Investiture ceremony held at the Rotunda, YOUWIN Connecton 28th May, 2024.
The presentation ceremony was in line with Presidential approval to confer the title on Officers in the Nigerian Foreign Service who have attained GL. 16.
Congratulations to the beneficiaries!
